root.title: Malicious Windows Script Components File Execution by TAEF Detection
root.description: Windows Test Authoring and Execution Framework (TAEF) framework allows you to run automation by executing tests files written on different languages (C, C#, Microsoft COM Scripting interfaces Adversaries may execute malicious code (such as WSC file with VBScript, dll and so on) directly by running te.exe
root.author: Agro (@agro_sev) oscd.community

falsepositives.item: It's not an uncommon to use te.exe directly to execute legal TAEF tests
